Article Name: What Is Your Health Record Worth? The Unseen Economics Behind Your Medical Data
Description: Real world data that harnesses deidentified health records is a multi-billion-dollar industry. But what is the value of a medical record?

Article Name: Cold Data At FMS And Magnetic Tape Data Recovery
Description: The 2025 FMS Conference included sessions and exhibitors working on colder storage. Channel Science developed a magnetic tape reader for recovering data from old tapes.

Article Name: Ataccama Eyes Data Quality Cracks In AI Infrastructure Desert
Description: Ataccama is a data quality company powered by data lineage, governance and observability functions that seeks to underpin AI information infrastructure.

Article Name: High-Capacity SSDs Will Enable AI Workloads But Also Drive HDD Demand
Description: FMS 2025 shows growth of high-capacity SSDs, up to 1PB as well as high-capacity HDDs to support the growth of AI workflows.

Article Name: Why Politicizing Economic Data Is Bad For Business
Description: Political interference in economic data threatens the business foundation that companies depend on for planning, forecasting, and investment decisions.

Article Name: U.S. Tariff Rate Soars To Levels Last Seen In The 1940s
Description: The average U.S. tariff rate is estimated to rise to 11.4% in 2025 in the light of much of the Trump administration’s reciprocal tariffs reinstated since this week.

Article Name: Sandisk And SK Hynix Agreement Enables Fast NAND Flash To DRAM In HBM Packages
Description: Sandisk and SK hynix announced that they would work together to create standards for high bandwidth NAND flash, HBF modules.

Article Name: C2Q 2025 HDD Industry Growth Projected For 2025
Description: HDD unit shipments, exabyte shipments and revenue were up signicantly in C1Q 2025 versus C1Q 2025.  HDD companies projected 2025 industry growth.

Article Name: The Inference Difference: Why Clunky Data Engineering Unhinges AI
Description: Firms can’t benefit from agentic AI without the inference process being able to draw on fluid, well-governed and permissioned data supply.

Article Name: Off Track? Progress On The UN’s Sustainable Development Goals
Description: Political instability, climate change effects and economic woes have affected many of the UN’s SDGs. Out of 167 subtargets, only 25 are on track to reach their 2030 aims.

Article Name: Golden Visa: Where You Can Buy Residence Permits
Description: After its unveiling in April and waitlist launch in June, the Trump golden visa program seems to be stalling. Elsewhere in the world, these schemes are up and running.

Article Name: Standards For Data Provenance And Digital Preservation
Description: SMPTE announced that it has created a Content Provenance and Authenticity in Media Study Group.

Article Name: Compute Labs Offers Investor Opportunities In AI Data Center Buildout
Description: Compute Labs allows investors to participate in the build out of AI data centers allowing data center operators to turn major capital investments into operating expenses.

Article Name: F5 Tightens Screws On Data Leakage In AI Application Delivery
Description: F5 CEO says point solutions to address multifaceted application delivery problems create a ‘ball of fire’ in terms of total systems management.

Article Name: Seagate HDDs For AI And Panmnesia’s Composable AI Infrastructure
Description: Seagate announces 30TB Mozaic HDDs infrastructure for AI.  Panmnesia introduces hardware, silicon IP, software and customized design solutions for AI infrastructure.

Article Name: Micron Increased QLC SSD Performance With Its Adaptive Write Technology
Description: Micron uses SLC and TLC combined with QLC flash and its adaptive write technology to increase the performance of its QLC 2600 M.2 SSD.

Article Name: Kioxia AiSAQ Improves AI Inference With Lower DRAM Costs
Description: Kioxia’s AiSAQ allows more scalable RAG AI inference systems by moving database vectors entirely into storage, thus avoiding DRAM growth with increasing database sizes.

Article Name: The Democratization Of Graph Data For Business Users
Description: Graph databases allow us to do more and know more and enable us to build knowledge graphs that can organize complex and convoluted information.

Article Name: How Well Protected Are India’s Products Of Protected Origin?
Description: The use of a local sandal design by Prada has caused an uproar on Indian social media. While the fashion house did not break WTO rules, it raised ethical questions.

Article Name: Okta Tightens Agent Identities For Machine-To-Machine Connections
Description: Okta has introduced  a new technology protocol to help secure AI agents.
